title: What to know about Trump's takeover of DC's Union Station
shortDescription: Department of Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said the federal government could manage the major transit hub better than its nonprofit partner.

title: Why did Trump halt their project? These union workers want answers
shortDescription: The Revolution Wind project was 80% complete when Trump put it on hold. Union laborers just want to work.

title: Will Trump's showdown with Fed's Lisa Cook end up at Supreme Court?
shortDescription: The Supreme Court could be asked to decide whether Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook can stay while she fights president's attempt to fire her.

title: Trump says federal government will not approve new solar projects
shortDescription: President Trump escalated his criticism of renewable energy, announcing his administration will no longer approve new wind or solar projects.

title: The vote is in on the Iowa Senate special election. Here's who won:
shortDescription: National and state support from Republicans and Democrats poured into the race for Iowa Senate District 1 with the GOP supermajority in the balance.

title: Trump’s India tariffs now in effect
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs on Indian goods begin August 27, impacting $48.2B in exports including clothing and chemicals.

title: Train station takeover? Trump administration to take control of Union Station
shortDescription: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said it will reclaim management of Washington Union Station. Trump officials have complained about homeless camps.

title: Trump's doubling of tariffs on Indian imports takes effect
shortDescription: Trump's doubling of tariffs on goods from India took effect, escalating tensions between the world's two largest democracies and strategic partners.

title: Jack Smith fires back at 'partisan' probe into Trump prosecutions
shortDescription: Former special counsel Jack Smith fired back against a reported investigation into his handling of prosecutions against President Donald Trump.

title: Trump reacts to Swift, Kelce engagement
shortDescription: President Donald Trump congratulated singer Taylor Swift and NFL player Travis Kelce on their engagement despite past tensions.

title: Trump wishes Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce luck on engagement
shortDescription: President Donald Trump weighed in on Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift's engagement announcement at a Cabinet meeting Aug. 26: 'Wish them a lot of luck.'

title: Trump on Mount Rushmore? Sculptor said too many 'stone limitations'
shortDescription: A bill introduced to Congress earlier this year called to put Trump on Mount Rushmore. The original sculptor said a fifth person isn't possible.

title: Trump rebrands signature legislation amid poor polling
shortDescription: Trump said he’s no longer referring to the new law as the One Big Beautiful Bill. The law’s title isn’t helping with the sales pitch, Trump said.

title: Trump seeks death penalty for DC murders
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced his administration will seek the death penalty for D.C. murders.

title: Kill someone in nation's capital? President Trump wants death penalty
shortDescription: Trump made the remark at his Cabinet meeting. It is likely to ratchet up the already heated national debate about capital punishment.

title: John Bolton rips Trump days after FBI searches his home and office
shortDescription: Former National Security Adviser John Bolton is back to criticizing President Donald Trump after last week's FBI search of his home and office.

title: Trump accused Fed's Lisa Cook of mortgage fraud. She's not the first.
shortDescription: Trump's attempt to oust the Fed's Governor is over accusations Cook made false statements on mortgage agreements. It's an accusation he's made before.

title: Trump's firing of Lisa Cook hinges on one thing: his reason why
shortDescription: Trump said he fired Fed governor Lisa Cook but legal experts say he hasn't justified the removal she vowed to fight from the independent board.

title: Trump DOJ loses lawsuit against Maryland judges over deportations
shortDescription: A Trump-appointed judge threw out a rare lawsuit brought by the administration against Maryland judges to block judicial orders on deportations.

title: Trump, Gov. Pritzker fight over Chicago. Will he deploy National Guard?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has said Chicago would be the next city to send the National Guard to. Gov. Pritzker said they aren't welcome. What to know.

title: Trump says Cracker Barrel should return to old logo
shortDescription: President Donald Trump jumped into the Cracker Barrel controversy, saying the company should "admit a mistake" and return to its old logo.

title: Trump threatens to send troops into Chicago. Gov. Pritzker fires back.
shortDescription: In speech, Pritzker says Trump won't improve Chicago's safety by sending in National Guard. Instead, he says the president is 'defunding the police.'

title: Man arrested outside White House for burning American flag
shortDescription: The Secret Service said it detained a person Aug. 25 for "igniting an object" near the White House, which news outlets reported as an American flag.
